distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nodejs6 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-8174: Fixed multiple memory corruption in napi_get_value_string_*() (bsc#1172443).
- CVE-2020-7598: Fixed an issue which could have tricked minimist into adding or modifying 
  properties of Object.prototype (bsc#1166916).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: minimist before 1.2.2 could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype using a "constructor" or "__proto__" payload.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: napi_get_value_string_*() allows various kinds of memory corruption in node < 10.21.0, 12.18.0, and < 14.4.0.
notes.title: CVE description
